body_html:
A few other things that don't work:

a = torch.zeros(2, 2)

a[[0,1], 0]                        # doesn't work
a[torch.LongTensor([0, 1]), 0]     # doesn't work
a[torch.LongTensor([0, 1])][:, 0]  # works

a[[0, 1]][:, 0]                    # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], :1]                      # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], 0:1]                     # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], 0:2]                     # works
body_text:
A few other things that don't work:
a = torch.zeros(2, 2)

a[[0,1], 0]                        # doesn't work
a[torch.LongTensor([0, 1]), 0]     # doesn't work
a[torch.LongTensor([0, 1])][:, 0]  # works

a[[0, 1]][:, 0]                    # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], :1]                      # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], 0:1]                     # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], 0:2]                     # works
body:
A few other things that don't work:
```python
a = torch.zeros(2, 2)

a[[0,1], 0]                        # doesn't work
a[torch.LongTensor([0, 1]), 0]     # doesn't work
a[torch.LongTensor([0, 1])][:, 0]  # works

a[[0, 1]][:, 0]                    # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], :1]                      # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], 0:1]                     # doesn't work
a[[0, 1], 0:2]                     # works
```
